theenm.description: Operation and new feature development for live broadcasting platform PopcornTV
responsibilities: Frontend Development: Operation and new feature development, performance optimization (Next.js 13 and TypeScript)
Short-form App Hybrid Page Development: Implemented hybrid pages for authentication, payment history, etc. (Next.js 14)
CI/CD Support: Built frontend deployment environment pipeline using Jenkins, Docker, and GitLab
Test Tool Introduction: Test automation and efficiency improvement through Jest and Playwright
Version Control Improvement: Improved collaboration and code management processes by introducing Git conventions
Frontend Development: Solution construction using RequireJS and jQuery for web, performance improvement and maintainability enhancement using React and TypeScript for mobile
Mobile App Enhancement: Rebuilt existing hybrid app based on React Native and implemented global state management using Redux
CI/CD Support: Experience in supporting pipeline construction using Jenkins
Automation Tool Introduction: Test automation and efficiency improvement through Playwright
